Statement.description: MS Edge appears on a user's desktop whether or not it had been deleted from %Public\Desktop prior to account creation. The difference is, if it exists in %Public%\Desktop at account creation then the user can't delete their own icon. If the %Public%\Desktop icon is deleted prior to account creation then the icon still shows up on new account's desktop but it can be deleted by the user.
Statement.name: ExecuteShellCommand
